name: Tomato Seed
summary: The tomato is the edible berry of the plant Solanum lycopersicum

name: Onion Seed
summary: The germination rate of these farm is very good. Generally farm are sown on the bed and a very thin layer of soil is applied on them to cover. Watering should be done just to keep the soil wet. (Heavy watering should be avoided) Within a week farm start germinating.

name: Wheat Seed
name.summary: Wheat is a grass widely cultivated for its seed, a cereal grain that is a worldwide staple food.[2][3][4] The many species of wheat together make up the genus Triticum; the most widely grown is common wheat (T. aestivum). The archaeological record suggests that wheat was first cultivated in the regions of the Fertile Crescent around 9600 BCE.

name.name: Sickle
name.summary: The Single-Edge Sickle is one of the most ancient of harvesting tools. It is a superior quality tool used to cut grass or harvest crops very easily. It features a wooden handle which is provided for a firm grip and allows the user to complete their task with speed and efficiency.

name.name: Shovel
name.summary: A shovel is a tool for digging, lifting, and moving bulk materials, such as soil, coal, gravel, snow, sand, or ore.

name.name: Hedge Shears
name.summary: It is a gardening tool or machine used for trimming (cutting, pruning) hedges or solitary shrubs (bushes). Different designs as well as manual and powered versions of hedge trimmers exist.

name.name: John Deere Harvester -T Series
name.summary: It has a powerful 100HP turbocharged engine and offers range of options from cutting to threshing of crops

name.name: Sowing Machine
name.summary: Seed Cum Fertilizer Drill for Tractor.  9 Tynes & 18 Pipes.  Require Tractor 35 HP Onwards

name.name: Mahindra Tractor 575 DI XP PLUS
name.summary: It is one of the best tractor models. This tractor model is manufactured by Mahindra Tractors. It is developed with high level technologies, making it powerful and reliable. Hence, the tractor model is loaded with innovative features which help to perform most challenging farming applications.
